actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to amend the Marine Mammal Protection Act of 1972 to deny aid, credit, loans, or loan guarantees to nations under certain circumstances.

summary.text: Amends the Marine Mammal Protection Act to prohibit extension of any aid, credit, loan, or loan guarantee to any nation which takes whales in a manner inconsistent with the Marine Mammal Protection Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Marine Mammal Protection Act of 1972 to deny aid, credit, loans, or loan guarantees to nations under certain circumstances.
